author: Justin Vallejo, Justin Vallejo
title: Coroanvirus: US states will go through 'rolling entry' when lockdown over, Dr Fauci says
description: 'Ultimately the virus is going to determine when we really can safely reopen'
content:
The coronavirus task forces leading public health expert, Dr Anthony Fauci, said there is light at the end of the tunnel, with a rolling entry for less-affected areas reopening before places like New York that are in a really difficult situation.
